text: Lev Semyonovich Rubinstein (; 19 February 1947 – 14 January 2024) was a Russian poet, essayist and social activist. Born on 19 February 1947 in Moscow to Jewish parents, Rubinstein studied philology at Moscow Pedagogical Institute for Correspondence Studies (now: Sholokhov Moscow State University for Humanities).
